author: Morgan Gstalter
title: Doctor who criticized hospital's measures against coronavirus is fired
description: A Washington state emergency room doctor who spoke out about what he called a lack of protective measures being implemented against the coronavirus at his hospital has been fired....
content:
A Washington state emergency room doctor who spoke out about what he called a lack of protective measures being implemented against the coronavirus at his hospital has been fired.
Dr. Ming Lin wrote in a Facebook post on Friday that he was terminated from hi… [+2717 chars]
